org.xbmc.android.remote.business

Class NowPlayingPollerThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • org.xbmc.android.remote.business.NowPlayingPollerThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class NowPlayingPollerThread
extends java.lang.Thread
    Activities (and other stuff) can subscribe to this thread in order to obtain real-time "Now playing" information. The thread will send relevant messages to all subscribers. If there are no subscriptions, nothing is polled. Please remember to unsubscribe (e.g. onPause()) in order to avoid unnecessary polling.
    Author:
    Team XBMC
